command.description: The command to invoke the scanner, typically the binary or path to a script
command.title: Command

args.description: List of arguments to pass to the scanner command. Defaults to an empty list.
args.title: Args

output_format.description: Expected output format from the scanner itself. Defaults to JSON
output_format.title: Output Format

missing_command_preference.description: How to handle scanner configurations that are missing commands. 'error' will raise an error, 'warning' will raise a warning, and 'ignore' will skip the scanner with an INFO log added to the aggregated results indicating that the scanner was skipped. Defaults to 'error'.
missing_command_preference.title: Missing Command Preference

can_be_overridden.description: Whether the scanner configuration can be overridden by runtime configuration
can_be_overridden.title: Can Be Overridden

overridable_properties.description: List of properties that can be overridden by runtime configuration
overridable_properties.title: Overridable Properties

description: Main configuration model for Automated Security Helper.

project_name.description: Name of the project being scanned
project_name.title: Project Name

output_file.description: Path to write scan results. If not specified, outputs to stdout
output_file.title: Output File

iac_scan.description: Configuration for Infrastructure as Code scanning tools
iac_scan.title: Iac Scan

exclude_paths.description: List of paths to exclude from scanning
exclude_paths.title: Exclude Paths

fail_on_findings.description: Whether to exit with non-zero code if findings are detected
fail_on_findings.title: Fail On Findings

max_concurrent_scanners.description: Maximum number of scanners to run concurrently
max_concurrent_scanners.title: Max Concurrent Scanners

title: ASHConfig
